products.title: Konya Blackout Iron Grey
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Konya Blackout Grey Roller Blind | Privacy, Thermal Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Konya Blackout Iron Grey Plain Roller Blind The Konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.metadescription: Metz PVC Blackout Ash Grey Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £10.36 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The Metz PVC Blackout patterned range, changes colour shades when light hits it, and offers a wide array of colours to choose from.  Waterproof and flame retardant, Metz fabrics are durable and practical. 
 
This mid-grey, marbled, Ash Grey blackout roller blind is also great at blocking out light, so is a great option for rooms where screens feature, such as living rooms or offices, and due to it's waterproof fabric, is also a smart option for bathrooms or kitchens. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new roller blind is made by our expert team, in our Yorkshire workshop, and comes with a FREE five year guarantee and customer-first aftercare.

 Product ID: SDB-RBX2282 Fabric Colour: Zinc Grey Material: 100% Polyester Lining: White Blackout Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.metadescription: Estella Blackout Steel Grey Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £15.46 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.

Our stunning Estella Blackout range is available in beautiful subtle shade. These blackout fabrics will provide a luxurious finish for your home interiors. Our steel grey shade will provide a wonderful focal point for your window dressing.

products.title: Loras Blackout Melody Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Loras Blackout Melody Grey Roller Blind in Grey/Multicoloured. Made to measure from £16.97 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Loras Blackout Melody Grey is an eye-catching electric roller blind that will add instant pretty appeal to your window of choice. �With an electric operation system, it quickly opens and closes at the touch of a button. �Featuring clusters of soft, white blossom and green leaves with bluebirds perching on branches it�s a serene design that will gain many compliments. �This blind is made using a specialist blackout fabric so the light will stay firmly away when this blind is closed.

products.title: Whitby PVC Blackout Stone Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Whitby PVC Blackout Stone Grey Roller Blind in Grey/Brown. Made to measure from £16.97 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
For a smart and contemporary finish to any room, Whitby Blackout PVC Stone Grey electric blind in stone grey is an eye-popping display of a cityscape featuring simply drawn houses interspersed with leafy trees. Plus, it's made of moisture resistant fabric so it's easy to keep it clean.

products.title: Cherry Blossom Blackout Serenity Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Cherry Blossom Blackout Serenity Grey Roller Blind in Grey/Pink. Made to measure from £20.95 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This stylish Japanese inspired design features a soft wash of grey with hints of white and touches of pink to give it the perfect balance of pastel colour. Little blossom sits on delicate branches giving this an air of peace and tranquillity. Ideal to dress up a light and airy room, gorgeous Cherry Blossom Blackout Serenity Grey roller blind is made from a luxurious blackout faux silk and treated with Pollergen a unique fabric treatment that neutralises pollen so helping to relieve hayfever symptoms.

products.metadescription: Midas Stripe Blackout Shadow Grey Roller Blind in White/Grey. Made to measure from £20.95 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The Midas Stripe Blackout range comes in a variety of beautiful colour tones that will stand out in any room. The blackout feature means you can control how much light you want in the room. Our shadow grey striped midas fabric is a mid-dark grey shaded blind. Perfect for making a statement within the home.
